skillTree.localised_description: A Knightly formation, in the Lady's name, to smash through battle lines; to defeat evil in the field.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.
Alphonse Dolmancé's mastery of debauchery and his alliance with Slaanesh have granted him insights into the construction and management of establishments dedicated to sinful pleasures.

effects.description:
Construction Cost: -35% for Economy and Slaanesh buildings
	(factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Alphonse Dolmancé's unwavering devotion to Slaanesh enhances his ability to inspire and lead those who serve the Lord of Excess. His presence significantly boosts the efficiency and output of Devotee buildings in his domains.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +10 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, and Chosen of Slaanesh
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

skillTree.localised_description: His mastery of the art of fragrance not only enhances his personal presence but also bestows a mystical aura upon his troops.

attributes.bullet_text:

	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: Alphonse Dolmancé's unwavering devotion to Slaanesh has drawn the favor of the Dark Prince upon certain units within his ranks. His mastery of debauchery and devotion grants a unique boon

effects.description:
Ability: "Dolmancé's Favorites'' for Marauders of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, and Chosen of Slaanesh
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Marauders of Slaanesh, Chaos Warriors of Slaanesh, and Chosen of Slaanesh
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Alphonse Dolmancé's overwhelming narcissism and obsession with his own image have a peculiar and supernatural impact on his surroundings. His belief in his own perfection is so potent that it imparts a mesmerizing effect on those who follow him, driving them into a frenzy of self-adoration and recklessness.

effects.description:
Ability: Frenzy for Peasant units
	(Lord's army)

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: He carries with him a unique elixir that enhances his own vitality and, when shared, bolsters the resilience of those under his command.

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 when laying siege or encircling
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: He has a unique understanding of elixirs, concoctions, and the manipulation of substances. He employs his knowledge to craft tinctures that both seduce and intoxicate

effects.description: Ability number of uses: +2 for "Gate of Slaanesh"

skillTree.localised_description: Alphonse Dolmancé, an agent of pleasure and decadence, possesses a unique talent for blurring the lines between the extravagant and the humble. In his presence, even the lowly peasant units revel in the same ecstasy as their more exalted counterparts, fighting with newfound vigor on the battlefield.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even stupid peasants can learn to stand fast and brace against the charge.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
As an expert in such matters, it is their duty to know the king's law and to mete justice in his name.
The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.
The Lord is entitled to collect tithes from tenants in return for continued protection.
With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.
Those whom the Lady has blessed fight with an unquenchable, almost super-human zeal, for they know that she sees them.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: "The land from here to the sea is yours, if you enforce the king's will."
The knowledge that they fight in the king's name, with his support, steels an army for the privations of the siege.
This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +8%
Chance of intercepting an army using Tunnelling, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%

skillTree.localised_description: Lords must not be concerned with the collecting of taxes; there are others whose lot it is to feel the people's scorn.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

factionEffects.localised_description: Lavish as ever, Alphonse Dolmancé lands with his group of cultists in the far lands of Ind, ready to plunge into excess.

A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.
